title: Iran head of judiciary appt. by Supreme Leader

content.question: In Iran, the head of the judiciary is

choices.label: appointed by the president and confirmed by the Guardian Council
chosen by a two-thirds majority of the Islamic Consultative Assembly (Majles)
chosen by majority vote in the Assembly of Religious Experts

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
